verses.verse: And it came <S%H1961><s%> to pass in the eleventh <S%H6240><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day of the month, <S%H2320><s%> that the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H1961><s%> to me, saying, <S%H559><s%>

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man, <S%H120><s%> because <S%H3282><s%> that Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> has said <S%H559><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> Aha, <S%H253><s%> she is broken <S%H7665><s%> that was the gates <S%H1817><s%> of the people: <S%H5971><s%> she is turned <S%H5437><s%> to me: I shall be replenished, <S%H4390><s%> now she is laid waste: <S%H2717><s%>

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I am against <S%H5921><s%> you, O Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> and will cause many <S%H7227><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up against <S%H5921><s%> you, as the sea <S%H3220><s%> causes his waves <S%H1530><s%> to come <S%H5927><s%> up.

And they shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> the walls <S%H2346><s%> of Tyrus, <S%H6865><s%> and break <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> her towers: <S%H4026><s%> I will also scrape <S%H5500><s%> her dust <S%H6083><s%> from her, and make <S%H5414><s%> her like the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock. <S%H5553><s%>

It shall be a place for the spreading <S%H4894><s%> of nets <S%H2764><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the sea: <S%H3220><s%> for I have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD: <S%H3069><s%> and it shall become <S%H1961><s%> a spoil <S%H957><s%> to the nations. <S%H1471><s%>

And her daughters <S%H1323><s%> which <S%H834><s%> are in the field <S%H7704><s%> shall be slain <S%H2026><s%> by the sword; <S%H2719><s%> and they shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> Behold, <S%H2005><s%> I will bring <S%H935><s%> on Tyrus <S%H6865><s%> Nebuchadrezzar <S%H5019><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon, <S%H894><s%> a king <S%H4428><s%> of kings, <S%H4428><s%> from the north, <S%H6828><s%> with horses, <S%H5483><s%> and with chariots, <S%H7393><s%> and with horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and companies, <S%H6951><s%> and much <S%H7227><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

He shall slay <S%H4191><s%> with the sword <S%H2719><s%> your daughters <S%H1323><s%> in the field: <S%H7704><s%> and he shall make <S%H5414><s%> a fort <S%H1785><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and cast <S%H8210><s%> a mount <S%H5550><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you, and lift <S%H6965><s%> up the buckler <S%H6793><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> you.

And he shall set <S%H5414><s%> engines <S%H4239><s%> of war <S%H6904><s%> against your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and with his axes <S%H2719><s%> he shall break <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> your towers. <S%H4026><s%>

By reason of the abundance <S%H8229><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> their dust <S%H80><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> you: your walls <S%H2346><s%> shall shake <S%H7493><s%> at the noise <S%H6963><s%> of the horsemen, <S%H6571><s%> and of the wheels, <S%H1534><s%> and of the chariots, <S%H7393><s%> when he shall enter <S%H935><s%> into your gates, <S%H8179><s%> as men enter <S%H935><s%> into a city <S%H5892><s%> wherein is made a breach. <S%H1234><s%>

With the hoofs <S%H6541><s%> of his horses <S%H5483><s%> shall he tread <S%H7429><s%> down all <S%H3605><s%> your streets: <S%H2351><s%> he shall slay <S%H4191><s%> your people <S%H5971><s%> by the sword, <S%H2719><s%> and your strong <S%H5797><s%> garrisons <S%H4676><s%> shall go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>

And they shall make <S%H5414><s%> a spoil <S%H7997><s%> of your riches, <S%H2428><s%> and make a prey <S%H962><s%> of your merchandise: <S%H7404><s%> and they shall break <S%H2040><s%> down <S%H2040><s%> your walls, <S%H2346><s%> and destroy <S%H5422><s%> your pleasant <S%H2532><s%> houses: <S%H1004><s%> and they shall lay <S%H7760><s%> your stones <S%H68><s%> and your timber <S%H6086><s%> and your dust <S%H6083><s%> in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of the water. <S%H4325><s%>

And I will cause the noise <S%H1995><s%> of your songs <S%H7892><s%> to cease; <S%H7673><s%> and the sound <S%H6963><s%> of your harps <S%H3658><s%> shall be no <S%H3808><s%> more <S%H5750><s%> heard. <S%H8085><s%>

And I will make you like the top <S%H6706><s%> of a rock: <S%H5553><s%> you shall be a place to spread <S%H4894><s%> nets <S%H2764><s%> on; you shall be built <S%H1129><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> more: <S%H5750><s%> for I the LORD <S%H3068><s%> have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it, said <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD <S%H3069><s%> to Tyrus; <S%H6865><s%> Shall not the isles <S%H339><s%> shake <S%H7493><s%> at the sound <S%H6963><s%> of your fall, <S%H4658><s%> when the wounded <S%H2491><s%> cry, <S%H602><s%> when the slaughter <S%H2027><s%> is made in the middle <S%H8432><s%> of you?

Then all <S%H3605><s%> the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall come <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> from their thrones, <S%H3678><s%> and lay <S%H5493><s%> away <S%H5493><s%> their robes, <S%H4598><s%> and put <S%H6584><s%> off their broidered <S%H7553><s%> garments: <S%H899><s%> they shall clothe <S%H3847><s%> themselves with trembling; <S%H2731><s%> they shall sit <S%H3427><s%> on the ground, <S%H776><s%> and shall tremble <S%H2729><s%> at every moment, <S%H7281><s%> and be astonished <S%H8074><s%> at you.

And they shall take <S%H5375><s%> up a lamentation <S%H7015><s%> for you, and say <S%H559><s%> to you, How <S%H349><s%> are you destroyed, <S%H6><s%> that were inhabited <S%H3427><s%> of seafaring <S%H3220><s%> men, the renowned <S%H1984><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> were strong <S%H2389><s%> in the sea, <S%H3220><s%> she and her inhabitants, <S%H3427><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cause <S%H5414><s%> their terror <S%H2851><s%> to be on all <S%H3605><s%> that haunt <S%H3427><s%> it!

Now <S%H6258><s%> shall the isles <S%H339><s%> tremble <S%H2729><s%> in the day <S%H3117><s%> of your fall; <S%H4658><s%> yes, the isles <S%H339><s%> that are in the sea <S%H3220><s%> shall be troubled <S%H926><s%> at your departure. <S%H3318><s%>

For thus <S%H3541><s%> said <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD; <S%H3069><s%> When I shall make <S%H5414><s%> you a desolate <S%H2717><s%> city, <S%H5892><s%> like the cities <S%H5892><s%> that are not inhabited; <S%H3427><s%> when I shall bring <S%H5927><s%> up the deep <S%H8415><s%> on you, and great <S%H7227><s%> waters <S%H4325><s%> shall cover <S%H3680><s%> you;

When I shall bring <S%H3381><s%> you down <S%H3381><s%> with them that descend <S%H3381><s%> into the pit, <S%H953><s%> with the people <S%H5971><s%> of old <S%H5769><s%> time, and shall set <S%H3427><s%> you in the low <S%H8482><s%> parts of the earth, <S%H776><s%> in places desolate <S%H2723><s%> of old, <S%H5769><s%> with them that go <S%H3381><s%> down <S%H3381><s%> to the pit, <S%H953><s%> that you be not inhabited; <S%H3427><s%> and I shall set <S%H5414><s%> glory <S%H6643><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of the living; <S%H2416><s%>

I will make <S%H5414><s%> you a terror, <S%H1091><s%> and you shall be no <S%H369><s%> more: though you be sought <S%H1245><s%> for, yet shall you never <S%H3808><s%> <S%H5769><s%> be found <S%H4672><s%> again, <S%H5750><s%> said <S%H5001><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> GOD. <S%H3069><s%>
